text: Thank you Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice may it please the Court.
They urge the unconstitutionality to the death penalty, and all other questions, right now I do not recall all this time, but there were all disposed off.
Does the Supreme Court have power to review the sentence in any way as such?
I gather a point, your just said the Supreme Court can not reduce the degree of the offense and then affirm the conviction say second degree murder.
